definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (master-workman) (a) king of Judah 2Ki 18:19, 2Ki 18:23, 2Ki 18:24, 2Ki 18:25, 1Ch 3:14, 2Ch 33:20, 2Ch 33:21, 2Ch 33:22, 2Ch 33:23, 2Ch 33:25, Je 1:2, Je 25:3; (b) captain of a city 1Ki 22:26, 2Ch 18:25; (c) one of the line of Solomon's servants Ne 7:59 = [[אָמִי]] Ezr 2:57.
